oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Aktuelle Ergebnisse zur Flugbrandresistenz von Nackthafer
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Herrmann, Dr. Matthias
Leithold, B.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Crop health, quality, protection
Breeding, genetics and propagation
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This report describes the resistance of some naked oats to Ustilago avenae. For inoculation a vacuum-aided method was used. Kernels were inoculated with a mixture of two German isolates as well as one Canadian smut sample. There was no resistant German cultivar among the naked oats tested, but two genebank accessions with resistance to smut were found.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Herrmann, Dr. Matthias and Leithold, B. (2005) Aktuelle Ergebnisse zur Flugbrandresistenz von Nackthafer. [Recent results on smut resistance in naked oats.] In: Heß, J and Rahmann, G (Eds.) Ende der Nische, Beiträge zur 8. Wissenschaftstagung Ökologischer Landbau, kassel university press GmbH, Kassel.
